thread.title: Enjoyable place to stay in London - Review
thread.title_full: Enjoyable place to stay in London - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sslazio17
title: Enjoyable place to stay in London - Review
text:
We've choosen this Hotel to stay and discover London. Its position is pretty good: just few steps from Westminster underground station or Pimlico as well.
We have been really satisfied by the breakfast buffet. An outstanding availability of everything you can desire for your breakfast: full typical british breakfast, or a continental one. A really good way to start your day, surrounded by the kind and gentle hotel's crew.
Rooms are wide enough to stay in a comfortable way, the daily cleaning service works pretty well. Very appreciated the solution of the iMac on the desk, which works also as TV (with international satellitar TV canals), but when needed a desktop PC can be very useful.
